com.prosthetics
Class PatientDB

java.lang.Object
  com.prosthetics.PatientDB

public class PatientDB
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class for accessing the accelerometer db. It can be used to add a new record, check whether a specified record already exists, count number of records, or fetch records from the database.

See Also:
PatientDBHelper
